chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:

Dear ladies and gentlemen,
I sent the package to the UPS Access Point in Kaarst, where it also arrived.

When picking up, I now have the following problem: During entry of the delivery address, I didn't mention my name

Dear ecomobile

Customer could not receive parcel because the parcel was delivered directly to a collection point and his name is not given. 
Can you inform UPS and confirm that the parcel can be delivered to Andreas Beyse?

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

Please give me feedback on the customer's request?

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

I have informed our logistics partner to send the necessary email and await updates.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile,

Is there any news? Can the customer pick up their parcel now?

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The carrier, UPS has been updated of the necessary changes to be made. 

Regards,
JH

Dear ecomobile,

Can the customer pick up their parcel now?


Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

The carrier has been updated regarding this matter. I believe the customer should be able to collect the parcel from the collection point again. Do let us know if the customer still has issues regarding the collection of the parcel. Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

the order has been returned to sender and the customer wants a refund.

Please act accordingly when you receive the package.

Regards,
Claudia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

In this case, please assist the customer in returning the device back to us. We await the arrival of the parcel.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

the order arrived at your warehouse today.

Please make your refund within 24 hours.

Regards,
Claudia from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
